abstractSubmitted.title: Your Abstract has been submitted!
abstractSubmitted.subheading: You will soon be contacted by our editors via the email you have indicated in the contact form.
abstractSubmitted.moreInfo: If any information needs to be changed, please contact us via email at jdh.admin@uni.lu

abstractSubmission.title: Abstract Submission
abstractSubmission.authorOrcidHelpText: * ORCID is required. Don't have an ORCID yet? Create one at orcid.org for free!
abstractSubmission.articleAbstractHelpText: Please take the multi-layered principle of the JDH articles into account. In particular, we would like you to describe the narrative layer, the hermeneutic layer and the data layer.
abstractSubmission.datasetDetails: Please describe the data you've used: we would like to know more about your findings, the tools / methods you followed and a reflection about possible bias
abstractSubmission.recaptchaDisclaimer: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
